actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates as wilderness within the National Wildlife Refuge System specified lands in Alaska, Arizona, California, Arkansas, Delaware, Hawaii, Oregon, Idaho, Maryland, Massachusetts, Minnesota, Wisconsin, Iowa, Illinois, Mississippi, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, North Carolina, South Carolina, Vermont and Virginia. Provides for the addition of lands to specified wilderness areas in Alaska, Arizona, California and Oregon. Designates as wilderness within the National Forest System specified lands in Arizona, New Mexico, California, Colorado, Idaho, Wyoming, Montana and Utah.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.
